import React, {useState} from "react" import * as Mui from "@mui/material" import Swal from "sweetalert2" function Register() { let [user, setUser] = useState({}) let onChangeHandler = (e) => { setUser({...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } let onSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetch("http://localhost:5000/auth/register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(user) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { Swal.fire(data.msg) }) } return(

Register Page

Register
) } export default Register
